== Description ==

This tag displays the '''A'''OL '''I'''nstant '''M'''essenger screenname for the author of a post.  The '''AIM''' field is set in the user's profile ([[Administration_Panels|Administration]] > [[Administration_Panels#Your_Profile|Profile]] > [[Your_Profile_SubPanel|Your Profile]]). This tag must be used within [[The Loop]].

== Replace With ==

* [[Template_Tags/the_author_meta | the_author_meta('aim')]]

== Usage ==

%%% <?php the_author_aim(); ?> %%%

== Parameters ==

This tag does not accept any parameters.

== Example ==

 &lt;p&gt;Contact me on AOL Instant Messenger: <?php the_author_aim(); ?>&lt;/p&gt;
